effects.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.

This move can hit Pok√©mon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop.

During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy.  During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
effects.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to confuse the target.

moveDescription:
The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a
fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also
confuse the target.
